name: Happiness and Log Income (partial correlation) (Clark et al. in World Happiness Report (2017))
description: Correlation between self-reported life satisfaction and income, after accounting for other variables (years of education, employment, marital status, physical illness, mental illness and gender)
datasetName: Happiness predictors â€“ World Happiness Report (2017)

source.name: Clark et al. in World Happiness Report (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Various surveys. Specificaly: USA (BRFSS); Australia (HILDA); Britain (BCS); Indonesia (IFLS)
source.additionalInfo: The variables have been dated 2017 in our dataset, in order to be consistent with the date of publication. However, the underlying data comes from various survey waves, varying by country. The online appendix in the original article provides details regarding actual dates of data collection.
